text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.   It was the only thing that could have saved you.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.   It was the only thing that could have saved you, you later discovered, because whatever that flash was, it killed all of them, while leaving most of the remaining Earthlings alive.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.   It was the only thing that could have saved you, you later discovered, because whatever that flash was, it killed all of them, while leaving most of the remaining Earthlings alive.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  



The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.



The witches were the only ones who had the power to do it, and they were the only ones who survived.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.   It was the only thing that could have saved you, you later discovered, because whatever that flash was, it killed all of them, while leaving most of the remaining Earthlings alive.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.

The witches were the only ones who had the power to do it, and luckily for the rest of us, they were some of the few who survived the invasion.  

These witches became the benevolent dictators of Earth, and most of you accepted their unchecked power.  At the very least, you all thought, the alien energies will soon be gone, and we'll all go back to normal.  Without their powers, the witches will just have to hold elections like we used to do in the good old days.

But you were wrong.

You never knew how the aliens were defeated, you just knew that there was an enormous flash in the sky.   It was the only thing that could have saved you, you later discovered, because whatever that flash was, it killed all of them, while leaving most of the remaining Earthlings alive.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.

The witches were the only ones who had the power to do it, and luckily for the rest of us, they were some of the few who survived the invasion.  

These witches became the benevolent dictators of Earth, and most of you accepted their unchecked power.  At the very least, you all thought, the alien energies will soon be gone, and we'll all go back to normal.  Without their powers, the witches will just have to hold elections like we used to do in the good old days.  

But you were wrong.  They got most of their power from the aliens, but they also discovered that Earth itself had magical powers.  These powers had always existed, but they were too weak when they divided up among billions of primates.  With only a few hundred thousand people left on Earth, anyone who tries hard enough can wield magical powers.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.

These witches became the benevolent dictators of Earth, and most of you accepted their unchecked power.  At the very least, you all thought, the alien energies will soon be gone, and we'll all go back to normal.  Without their powers, the witches will just have to hold elections like we used to do in the good old days.  

But you were wrong.  They got most of their power from the aliens, but they also discovered that Earth itself had magical powers.  These powers had always existed, but they were too weak when they divided up among billions of primates.  With only a few hundred thousand people left on Earth, anyone who tries hard enough can wield magical powers.

The witches had discovered that they could manipulate the Earth's magical energies, and they had begun to do so.  Luckily, they were good witches, so they always did so with good intentions, but we are humans after all, and many of us disagreed.

Everyone with any kind of an agenda tried to use magic to attain their wishes, and other groups used magic to fight against them.  

Eventually, however, we settled into a two-party system.  There were good witches, and there were wicked witches.  Not surprisingly, the good witches agreed to hold elections.  The wicked witches tried to stop people from voting, but they were only successful about half of the time.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.

These witches became the benevolent dictators of Earth, and most of you accepted their unchecked power.  At the very least, you all thought, the alien energies will soon be gone, and we'll all go back to normal. But you were wrong.  They got most of their power from the aliens, but they also discovered that Earth itself had magical powers.  These powers had always existed, but they were too weak when they divided up among billions of primates.  With only a few hundred thousand people left on Earth, anyone who tries hard enough can wield magical powers.

The witches had discovered that they could manipulate the Earth's magical energies, and they had begun to do so.  Luckily, they were good witches, so they always did so with good intentions, but we are humans after all, and many of us disagreed.

Everyone with any kind of an agenda tried to use magic to attain their wishes, and other groups used magic to fight against them.  

Eventually, however, we settled into a two-party system.  There were good witches, and there were wicked witches.  Not surprisingly, the good witches agreed to hold elections.  The wicked witches tried to stop people from voting, but they were only successful about half of the time.  

The good witches had initially been the ones who had the most power, but now that everyone had magic, the wicked witches were able to use it as well.  When the wicked witches were in power, sometimes they had good intentions, and sometimes they just ruled with cruelty.

Everyone with any kind of an agenda tried to use magic to attain their wishes, and other groups used magic to fight against them.  

Eventually, however, we settled into a two-party system.  There were good witches, and there were wicked witches.  Not surprisingly, the good witches agreed to hold elections.  The wicked witches tried to stop people from voting, but they were only successful about half of the time.  

The good witches had initially been the ones who had the most power, but now that everyone had magic, the wicked witches were able to use it as well.  When the wicked witches were in power, sometimes they had good intentions, and sometimes they just ruled with cruelty.

You had always just assumed that it was some secret new weapon that the military had developed, but the more time that passes, the more you realize that the military had been wiped out just like the rest of the world.  

The survivors have begun to find that they have the ability to manipulate the energy that the aliens had been using to attack them.  In fact, it was a small convent of self-proclaimed witches that actually combined their powers and blasted all of the aliens out of the sky.

The witches were the only ones who had the power to do it, and luckily for the rest of us, they were some of the few who survived the invasion.

At the very least, you all thought, the alien energies will soon be gone, and we'll all go back to normal. But you were wrong.  They got most of their power from the aliens, but they also discovered that Earth itself had magical powers.  These powers had always existed, but they were too weak when they divided up among billions of primates.  With only a few hundred thousand people left on Earth, anyone who tries hard enough can wield magical powers.

The witches had discovered that they could manipulate the Earth's magical energies, and they had begun to do so.  Luckily, they were good witches, so they always did so with good intentions, but we are humans after all, and many of us disagreed.

Everyone with any kind of an agenda tried to use magic to attain their wishes, and other groups used magic to fight against them.  

Eventually, however, we settled into a two-party system.  There were good witches, and there were wicked witches.  Not surprisingly, the good witches agreed to hold elections.  The wicked witches tried to stop people from voting, but they were only successful about half of the time.  

The good witches had initially been the ones who had the most power, but now that everyone had magic, the wicked witches were able to use it as well.  When the wicked witches were in power, sometimes they had good intentions, and sometimes they just ruled with cruelty.

This is the world you live in now.  Power shifts back and forth, and no one can seem to figure out that the other side is actually the evil one.  

At least people aren't literally killing themselves over it, like we used to do before the invasion, back in the bad old days.

You can't help but remember that old quote that Einstein made.  "I don't know what kind of weapons that World War 3 will be fought with, but World War 4 will be fought with sticks and stones".

You used to think that the old professor was wrong, but then you realize, that magic wands and crystals are just that: sticks, and stones.

These powers had always existed, but they were too weak when they divided up among billions of primates.  With only a few hundred thousand people left on Earth, anyone who tries hard enough can wield magical powers.

The witches had discovered that they could manipulate the Earth's magical energies, and they had begun to do so.  Luckily, they were good witches, so they always did so with good intentions, but we are humans after all, and many of us disagreed.

Everyone with any kind of an agenda tried to use magic to attain their wishes, and other groups used magic to fight against them.  

Eventually, however, we settled into a two-party system.  There were good witches, and there were wicked witches.  Not surprisingly, the good witches agreed to hold elections.  The wicked witches tried to stop people from voting, but they were only successful about half of the time.  

The good witches had initially been the ones who had the most power, but now that everyone had magic, the wicked witches were able to use it as well.  When the wicked witches were in power, sometimes they had good intentions, and sometimes they just ruled with cruelty.

This is the world you live in now.  Power shifts back and forth, and no one can seem to figure out that the other side is actually the evil one.  

At least people aren't literally killing themselves over it, like we used to do before the invasion, back in the bad old days.

You can't help but remember that old quote that Einstein made.  "I don't know what kind of weapons that World War 3 will be fought with, but World War 4 will be fought with sticks and stones".

You used to think that the old professor was wrong, but then you realized that magic wands and crystals are just that: sticks, and stones.

You doubt that this is what Herr Einstein had truly meant, but you can take comfort in the wisdom of a bygone age.

"What a time to be alive" you think to yourself, as you pick up your hammer and saw.


THE END
